meanings.definition: Work that is unnecessary or trivial.
meanings.sent1: The teacher assigned us some busywork to keep us occupied.
meanings.sent2: I spent the afternoon doing busywork that didn't contribute to the project.
meanings.sent3: The busywork of organizing my sock drawer felt like a waste of time.
meanings.sent4: Her mindless busywork was like spinning wheels in the mud.
meanings.sent5: The busywork of counting blades of grass made me realize how pointless it was.

meanings.definition: Tasks or activities that keep someone busy but have little value or purpose.
meanings.sent1: During the meeting, we were given busywork to keep us occupied.
meanings.sent2: She always gives me busywork to do when she wants to keep me busy.
meanings.sent3: The busywork of rearranging the pens on my desk seemed never-ending.
meanings.sent4: His busywork was like a hamster running on a wheel, going nowhere.
meanings.sent5: The busywork of alphabetizing my bookshelf felt like a never-ending task.
